36#include "gsskrb5_locl.h"
37
38OM_uint32
39_gsskrb5_lifetime_left(OM_uint32 *minor_status,
40 krb5_context context,
41 OM_uint32 endtime,
42 OM_uint32 *lifetime_rec)
43{
44 krb5_timestamp now;
45 krb5_error_code kret;
46
47 if (endtime == 0) {
48 *lifetime_rec = GSS_C_INDEFINITE;
49 return GSS_S_COMPLETE;
50 }
51
52 kret = krb5_timeofday(context, &now);
53 if (kret) {
54 *lifetime_rec = 0;
55 *minor_status = kret;
56 return GSS_S_FAILURE;
57 }
58
59 if (endtime < now)
60 *lifetime_rec = 0;
61 else
62 *lifetime_rec = endtime - now;
63
64 return GSS_S_COMPLETE;
65}
66
67
68OM_uint32 GSSAPI_CALLCONV _gsskrb5_context_time
69 (OM_uint32 * minor_status,
70 gss_const_ctx_id_t context_handle,
71 OM_uint32 * time_rec
72 )
73{
74 krb5_context context;
75 OM_uint32 endtime;
76 OM_uint32 major_status;
77 const gsskrb5_ctx ctx = (const gsskrb5_ctx) context_handle;
78
79 GSSAPI_KRB5_INIT (&context);
80
81 HEIMDAL_MUTEX_lock(&ctx->ctx_id_mutex);
82 endtime = ctx->endtime;
83 HEIMDAL_MUTEX_unlock(&ctx->ctx_id_mutex);
84
85 major_status = _gsskrb5_lifetime_left(minor_status, context,
86 endtime, time_rec);
87 if (major_status != GSS_S_COMPLETE)
88 return major_status;
89
90 *minor_status = 0;
91
92 if (*time_rec == 0)
93 return GSS_S_CONTEXT_EXPIRED;
94
95 return GSS_S_COMPLETE;
96}
